1.Title: Security Patrol
1.Description: Increases CRIT Rate by <color=#2BAD00>15%</color>. Launching an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> grants the equipper 8 Charge stacks, up to a maximum of 8 stacks. Whenever the equipper's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color> deals <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>, consumes a Charge stack and increases the skill's DMG by <color=#2BAD00>35%</color>.
